address: 269 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
description:
Can't Help Falling In Love | 'Heritage Cottage' circa 1900
Peeking through a flowering garden of weeping cherries and daffodils, behind a pretty picket fence, this 'heritage listed' c1900 cottage will capture your heart.
A wealth of period embellishments, such as 12ft ceilings with ornate cornices, intricate fretwork and sash windows, enhance its romantic allure, whilst original timber floorboards provide hints of its historic past.
~ Generous master bedroom with a walk-in-robe, ceiling fan and a semi-ensuite.
~ Additional bedroom with a ceiling fan.
~ Be warmly greeted by a spacious living room, consisting of a gas log fireplace and ceiling fans.
~ Taking centre stage is a kitchen worthy of appearing on the pages of a home design magazine, with a double fridge cavity, Miele dishwasher, walk-in pantry with a sink and preparation bench; and adjoining a dining room with a Nectre wood heater.
~ Awe-inspiring bathroom is a picture of relaxation with a freestanding bath and walk-in shower.
~ Climate controlled by ducted heating and refridgerated cooling throughout.
~ On-trend laundry is replete with encaustic tiles and a W.C. for guest convenience.
~ The home office can be converted into a third bedroom with the luxury of seamless French doors opening onto a large all-weather deck, enabling effortless indoor and outdoor entertaining.
~ Gaze down from the deck to the enchanting rear garden, made private by a lush cloak of citrus growth, herbs, vegetables and an olive tree - just to name a few.
~ Remote-controlled freestanding double garage and a garden shed tucked at the rear.
~ Completing the wish-list in this delightful home is a chook pen and secure side gates.
With so many conveniences so close by it would be difficult to imagine a more desirable location. Only moments to local shops, transport, HMAS Cerberus Naval Base and the Recreation Reserve.

Presentable Home on Massive Block!
Situated on approximately 1600sqm this presentable home with plenty of scope offers opportunity for families, first home buyers and investors/developers (STCA)
Features include:
- 3 bedrooms with BIR
- Sizeable living and dining areas
- Kitchen with plenty of cupboard space and dishwasher
- Family bathroom
- Full length under cover decking at rear of home
- 1600 sqm block with development potential (STCA)
Contact Sean Crimmins 0411734814 for your private inspection

Location Perfect
This immaculately presented 3 bedroom villa has been built with quality workmanship and a modern facade in mind.
Features include a designer kitchen with stainless steel cooking appliances, including dishwasher.
Open plan dining area and separate lounge room.
Main bedroom features walk in robe and ensuite, two further bedrooms have built in robes.
Tiled wet areas and carpet throughout, ducted heating and R/C cooling x 2 are available.
Outside features outdoor decking area, surrounded by landscaped gardens, back and front. d/b garage/remote .
Secure parking is available for guests.
Perfectly located to heart of Crib Point, pool and park surrounds makes this location perfect.

Warm And Welcoming With Captivating Charm On 1/4 Acre (Approx.)
SOLD PRIOR TO AUCTION | With all the grandeur of yesteryear, you will fall in love from the first moment you see this picture perfect home.
Typical of its era the home boasts a generous floor plan, framed by 12ft ceilings with chandeliers, picture rails and wall paneling. It effortlessly blends old and new to offer an ideal family home that exceeds expectations of comfort and grace.
~ Gorgeous parents retreat consisting of built-in-robes, ensuite with a walk-in shower, plantation shutters and a sliding door leading out to a flourishing garden oasis.
~ Two remaining bedrooms are both sizable and offer built-in-robes.
~ Perfectly presented interiors are enhanced by a sitting room with a gas wood fire, which flows through to a formal lounge room with direct access onto the private front deck.
~ At the heart of this home lies a spacious, well appointed kitchen featuring an abundance of cabinetry, island bench, Bosch dishwasher, Omega oven and a large butler's pantry with a double sink; this culinary space is all about functionality.
~ Overlooking the kitchen is an open plan living zone and dining area with split system heating and cooling.
~ Presenting as an entertainer's wonderland is a beautifully designed and landscaped backyard, where a swim spa, pizza oven and child-friendly lawns all come together.
~ Rear lane-way access to a shed with power, hot house and a nursery.
~ Completing this perfect package is a single carport, study nook and ducted heating throughout.
~ Within easy walking distance of transport, shops and leading schools.
Auction: Saturday, April 28th at 1:30pm.
Terms: 10% Deposit, Settlement 90 days.
Offers will be considered prior to Auction.

Rewarding Retreat or Investment Opportunity
Immaculately presented with light-filled interiors and modern amenities, this impressive unit is hard to beat.
~ Master bedroom with built-in-robes and semi-ensuite.
~ Two remaining bedrooms with built-in-robes.
~ Open plan lounge, dining and modern kitchen with Bosch dishwasher, gas cooktop and plenty of cupboard space.
~ Single lock-up garage with internal access.
~ Private courtyard with established gardens.
~ Its peaceful address is only 500m from a variety of shops and public transport.

SO VERY SPECIAL - THE RIGHT UNIT IN A SMART LOCATION
The perfect catch, a stylishly appointed & super large unit in Coastal Crib Point currently on the charts as the Go to Place!!!
- Private master bedroom with WIR and ensuite
- Spare Bedrooms both with BIR,
- Family bathroom with separate WC
- Fantastic kitchen with stainless steel appliances Dishwasher, Gas cooker, and Electric Oven
- High ceilings throughout
- Seamless indoor/outdoor living with impressive undercover outdoor entertaining area
- Sizeable yard area with mature landscaped gardens
- Double garage with secure access to the home and rear yard
- Split system air conditioner heating and cooling
- 17 Solar panels plus Water tanks
Crib Point is quickly becoming a new hot spot of the Peninsula, with plenty to offer including great Schools, Public transport, Childcare facilities, Shops and of course fishing in the Western Port Bay.
First home buyers, investors, downsizing, this home ticks all the right boxes.
Call Richard Whitehead 0412 328 718 for Inspection

Timeless Character, Practicality and Comfort!
Situated in a quiet pocket of Crib Point only a short walk to schools, reserves, sports fields and transport. This well thought out
mudbrick house is perfect for those looking for an individual and comfortable family, first or retirement home!
Features Include:
- 3 bedrooms with robes
- Light and bright open plan living and dining areas
- Rustic style kitchen with premium 900mm stove and dishwasher
- Family oriented bathroom
- Loft style guest bedroom/study
- Soaring ceilings
- Outdoor undercover entertaining area
- Established gardens
- Ample shedding
- Single carport plus plenty exposed parking space
This is a happy home :) that needs to be seen to be fully appreciated!
Contact Sean Crimmins 0411734814 for further details

Character That Invites Creativity
UNDER OFFER AT THE FIRST OPEN HOME | Perfect as an entry level home or investment property, this tidy and comfortable residence is either ready to be moved into now, or awaiting a keen renovator to re-imagine or re-build (STCA.)
Set on a sunny, level block in a whisper-quiet setting , this is a popular suburb with families thanks to its close proximity to coastal walking trails, public transport, Crib Point Recreation Reserve and sporting grounds.
~ Spacious master bedroom + two additional bedrooms all with built-in-robes and near-new carpet.
~ Functional kitchen consisting of a gas cooktop and double fridge cavity.
~ There's plenty of space to spread out, with a dining area and a generous lounge room with a ceiling fan and gas heater for the colder months.
~ Brand new double carport and side access to a workshop with power and built-in shelving.
~ Large rear yard and a veggie patch with an abundance of delicious cherry tomatoes.

UNDER OFFER
Look no further - An admirable place to start, downsize or even invest! This recently refreshed unit is positioned at the front of the block with its own street frontage (Facing Milne Street) and driveway and is only one of four on the block!
With a unique fa√ßade, this bright and natural light filled unit with all the modern conveniences you could need is the perfect first home or investment in a quiet and appealing pocket of crib point. Situated just a short walk from public transport, the local primary school, pool & shops, and the near-by bushland reserve, this property is positioned within arm's reach to all of the local amenities .
Recently revamped, with new kitchen benchtops, tiling, bathroom/laundry and external landscaping the home feels fresh and inviting. The kitchen features an electric free standing oven/cooktop and offers an outlook onto the beautifully updated rear courtyard.
The home also has air conditioning/split system heating and an electric wall heater for those chilly winter nights! To top it all off, the home has an enclosed single garage and it also has an outhouse/ second toilet which is accessible from the backyard.

Absolute Perfection!!!
From the moment you step into this beautiful modern home you will fall in love. Meticulously cared for and immaculate through out you will instantly admire the abundance of natural light, neutral soft color tones, well designed floor plan with 3 spacious bedrooms all with walk in robes, 2 separate living areas, well-appointed gourmet kitchen with plenty of cupboard space and stainless-steel appliances. Walk out to your own court yard paradise with gorgeous landscaping and deck for those long summer nights of barbecuing and entertaining. Also new floors and freshly painted there is absolutely nothing to do here except move in and enjoy!
Other features of the home include, 2 reverse cycle split systems, double garage with back yard and internal access.
This is a fantastic central location with only a short distance to local shops, schools and public transport.

address: 282 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
description:
A Big Block With Big Possibilities On 1,380sqm (Approx.)
UNDER OFFER IN 1 WEEK | Situated in the tranquil and leafy end of Crib Point within arm's reach of shops, public transport and HMAS Cerberus Naval Base; this solid brick-veneer residence ticks all the boxes for developers and young families.
~ Extend, re-build or subdivide (S.T.C.A.) on approximately 1,380sqm.
~ Three spacious bedrooms.
~ Dining area and updated kitchen with overhead cupboards, dishwasher and gas cooktop.
~ Generous lounge room with ceiling fan and ornate ceiling cornices throughout.
~ Decked outdoor entertaining area.
~ Solar panels, garden shed and side access to a large rear yard.
~ Currently leased until September 2018 for $370 per week. Advertised photos are from the previous tenancy.

address: 4/335 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
description:
Affordable 3 Bedroom Cottage!
Want to downsize? But don't want to end up in a pokey little unit? This well priced unit within a short distance to the Disney Street Shops is positioned in a private, well presented unit complex and feels open, light and spacious.
This enticing property comprises of, three bedrooms with a central bathroom and a functional kitchen with stainless steel appliances comprising wall oven, gas hot plates, range hood and dishwasher with tiled floors.
Other comforts of this property include a spacious living area, gas heating, lovely low maintenance garden and private courtyard area, giving you more time to enjoy the finer things in life.
Also including a carport and separate garage space this unit in a complex of 6, is only a short distance away from local shops, schools, local train station, bus stops and is not to be missed!

address: 450 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
description:
UNDER OFFER!
Perfectly positioned, backing onto acres of rural farmland you have unobstructed rural outlook over Crib Point and the greater wetlands. Located only moments away from all Crib Point has to offer, this magnificent property allotted on approx. 900sqm, is sure to be suited to first home buyers, downsizing retirees, investors, young families or anyone looking for a great property in an even better location!
This 3 bedroom brick veneer combines timeless period features such as high ceilings and polished timber flooring throughout with modern touches such as an updated kitchen and bathroom. The open plan living, dining and kitchen includes dishwasher, electric oven, induction cooktop all with comfort of split system heating and cooling. The updated bathroom contains walk-in shower, bath and toilet. Outside you will find the large merbau decking area overlooking the unimpeded rural farmlands, ideal for those wanting to enjoy the privacy and serenity of a centrally located residential property with that acreage feel.
Additional features also include substantial 4 car shed, 2 bedrooms with built in robes, side access, separate laundry and 2 toilets.
Don't miss your opportunity to secure this magnificent home located only moments away from everything Crib Point has to offer including schools, cafes, shopping and public transport - whilst remaining only a short drive to local beaches, renowned local wineries and all the Mornington Peninsula has to offer. Great family homes in this price range and quality are disappearing fast so your immediate inspection is recommended.

First home buyers, investors or downsizers this one is for you!!
Located in the heart of Crib Point, this property is in the perfect location to everything this Costal town has to offer. If you are looking for your first home, to down size or to add to your investment portfolio. This home is the one for you.
- 3 large bedrooms, 2 with built in robes, master with walk in robe and ensuite
- Split system heating and cooling
- Huge kitchen with s/s appliances including dishwasher
- Undercover entertainment area
- Double Garage with rear door access
Being a stones through away from schools, public transport and amazing fishing and with too many features to mention, this property is a must to inspect.

Fantastic First Home Or Investment In A Superb Lifestyle Locale
Cleverly designed, this immaculate unit has a highly functional floor plan that maximises living and entertaining with a seamless flow through to a landscaped rear garden, while benefiting from a sunny north-easterly aspect.
~ Both bedrooms are generous with the master equipped with a walk-in-robe and semi-ensuite.
~ Entertaining will be a pleasure in the modern kitchen that features stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and an abundance of storage.
~ Generously-sized laundry and bathroom with separate bath and shower.
~ Combined dining and lounge room offering split system heating and cooling.
~ Single garage with internal access.
~ Tenanted until April 2019.
In a knockout location, just a short walk to the town centre and transport, this sought-after residence will catch the eye of investors and first home buyers alike.

A NEW LIFESTYLE AWAITS
Expressions of interest are required on these 4 quality luxury villas in the heart of Crib Point. Immersed in quality fixtures and fittings, all include 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, family and dining room. These luxury units have everything you want, 8.5 foot ceilings, open plan kitchen area, stone bench tops, Italian stainless steel appliances, carpets, double garage, a large alfresco area. The properties are all quality and class and will certainly attract astute investors or owner occupiers. Contact Don McKenzie for all information and inclusions. BUY OFF THE PLAN AND SAVE ON STAMP DUTY. $5,000 deposit balance 10% 120 days after signing/balance on completion.
Please note:- Not actual property photos. These photos are from a previous similar development by the same builder.

Quiet and Peaceful Location
Brand new 6 star rated brick veneer unit located in a peaceful setting.
There are 3 bedrooms, the main with walk in robe and ensuite, the others have built in robes.
Two open plan living areas and external to the remote garage.
The modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, designer tap ware and plenty of cupboard space overlooks the outside decking are.
Floating floors in living areas, reverse cycle split system all for your comfort.
This villa is currently tenanted on a good return at $360 per week.
Contact Don McKenzie on 0419 955 177.

I Know A Place
This low maintenance home located in Crib Point is an ideal and affordable opportunity for the smart investor or first home buyer to gain entry into the soaring Mornington Peninsula property market.
The home features three generous sized bedrooms, master with walk in robe and ensuite. The kitchen boasts a walk in pantry and oversized island bench which overlooks the open plan living and dining areas. There is a remote double lock up garage with internal access and the corner allotment is low maintenance and ideal for a busy lifestyle.
- Three bedrooms, master with WIR and ensuite
- Spacious kitchen with walk in pantry
- Open plan family and dining areas
- Main bathroom with separate W.C.
- Double lock up garage with remote and internal access
For further information, please contact Dominic Tallon on 0408 528 857.

Exciting Renovation Potential On 872sqm (Approx.)
UNDER OFFER IN 14 DAYS | Make your mark on this original brick-veneer residence and capitalise on its private setting, sunny north-east aspect and superb potential.
Nestled in a prime family-friendly location within easy walking distance to leading Primary Schools and Crib Point Recreation Reserve with its sporting grounds and community swimming pool.
~ Spacious parents retreat or second living room with air-conditioning.
~ Three additional bedrooms.
~ Functional kitchen and combined lounge/dining room with gas pot belly heating.
~ Split system heating & cooling to living zone.
~ Covered outdoor entertaining area and double carport that could be easily converted into a garage.

UNDER OFFER
Positioned for complete convenience is this beautiful 4-bedroom home in peaceful cul-de-sac seclusion only minutes from Morradoo and Crib Point train station, shops and schools.
Here contemporary living is easily achieved with an impressive open and free-flowing floorplan with two separate living areas and a stylish kitchen boasting Blanco stainless steel appliances, a built-in pantry an additional breakfast bar with pendent lights. With enough space for the whole family, the home comprises of 3 generous bedrooms with built in robes serviced by a family bathroom plus a master suite with built in robes and ensuite.
Further luxury is found outside with the covered alfresco entertaining complimented by drought-tolerant plantings, a Balinese hut and a bubbling five-seat outdoor spa.
On a decent 1044sqm approx. block, the property caters perfectly for a growing family and pets with a free-standing lock up garage and animal enclosure and side access to the backyard whilst an additional double lock up garage with remote access caters perfectly for two cars. The secured front fence keeps the property nice and private and leaves more space for children or animals to run around. This property is full of surprises with gas ducted heating and cooling throughout, perfect for all seasons.
Boating enthusiasts will appreciate the close proximity to Hans Inlet and Westernport Bay whilst the local primary school, nature parks and nearby town shopping offers every amenity at your doorstep.
